;RRW draggable WRC code by Swordmaster August 2014---
;45 deg curve snap
0x5d540200,2,0,0x5d550300,0,0=0x5d550200,0,0,0x5d550300,0,0
0x5d540200,0,0,0x5d550300,2,1=0x5d550200,2,1,0x5d550300,2,1
0x5d540000,1,0,0x5d550200,3,0=0x5d550100,3,0,0x5d550200,3,0
0x5d540000,1,0,0x5d550200,1,1=0x5d550100,1,1,0x5d550200,1,1
0x5d540000,3,0,0x5d550200,3,0=0x5d550100,3,0,0x5d550200,3,0
0x5d540000,3,0,0x5d550200,1,1=0x5d550100,1,1,0x5d550200,1,1
0x5d540000,1,0,0x5d550100,3,0=0x5d550000,3,0,0x5d550100,3,0
0x5d540000,1,0,0x5d550100,1,1=0x5d550000,1,1,0x5d550100,1,1
0x5d540000,3,0,0x5d550100,3,0=0x5d550000,3,0,0x5d550100,3,0
0x5d540000,3,0,0x5d550100,1,1=0x5d550000,1,1,0x5d550100,1,1
;override INRUL conflict with the minicurves
0x5d550300,3,0,0x5d540400,2,1=0x5d550300,3,0,0x5d550400,3,0
0x5d550300,1,1,0x5d540400,0,0=0x5d550300,1,1,0x5d550400,1,1

0x5d540600,1,0,0x5d550500,0,1=0x5d550600,0,1,0x5d550500,0,1
;90 deg curve
0x5d550600,1,1,0x5d540100,1,0=0x5d550600,1,1,0x5d550b00,0,0
0x5d550600,3,0,0x5d540100,2,0=0x5d550600,3,0,0x5d550b00,2,1
;s-curve
0x5d540000,1,0,0x5d550800,0,0=0x5d550700,0,0,0x5d550800,0,0
0x5d540000,1,0,0x5d550800,2,1=0x5d550700,2,1,0x5d550800,2,1

0x5d550800,0,0,0x5d540200,3,0=0x5d550800,0,0,0x5d550900,0,0
0x5d550800,2,1,0x5d540200,3,0=0x5d550800,2,1,0x5d550900,2,1
